sourcesContent:
import React, { useContext, useState } from 'react' import ProductsContext from '../../context/ProductsContext' import { Form, Container, Button } from 'react-bootstrap' const Profile = () => { const {currentCustomer} = useContext(ProductsContext) const [formData, setFormData] = useState({ name: currentCustomer.name, email: currentCustomer.email }) function handleChange(event){ setFormData({...formData, [event.target.name]: event.target.value}) } return (

Name: {currentCustomer.name}

Email: {currentCustomer.email}
) } export default Profile
